(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am) (RB not)
      (ADJP (JJ sure))
      (SBAR (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ fair)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB enter)
                    (NP (DT this) (NNP Briyani))
                    (PP (IN as)
                      (NP (DT a) (NN challenger)))
                    (SBAR (IN because)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                          (ADVP (RB actually))
                          (VP (VB sell)
                            (NP (NNP Indian) (NNP Briyani))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(sure-4, I-1)
cop(sure-4, am-2)
neg(sure-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, sure-4)
mark(fair-8, if-5)
nsubj(fair-8, it-6)
cop(fair-8, is-7)
advcl(sure-4, fair-8)
aux(enter-10, to-9)
xcomp(fair-8, enter-10)
det(Briyani-12, this-11)
dobj(enter-10, Briyani-12)
prep(enter-10, as-13)
det(challenger-15, a-14)
pobj(as-13, challenger-15)
mark(sell-21, because-16)
nsubj(sell-21, they-17)
aux(sell-21, do-18)
neg(sell-21, n't-19)
advmod(sell-21, actually-20)
advcl(enter-10, sell-21)
nn(Briyani-23, Indian-22)
dobj(sell-21, Briyani-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP (VBP sell)
      (NP (NNP Afghan)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(sell-2, They-1)
root(ROOT-0, sell-2)
dobj(sell-2, Afghan-3)

  (S
    (NP (JJ Iranian)
      (CC and)
      (JJ Turkish) (NNS Dum))
    (VP (VBZ Briyani)
      (ADVP (RB instead)))
    (. .)))

conj(Iranian-1, Turkish-3)
nsubj(Briyani-5, Dum-4)
root(ROOT-0, Briyani-5)
advmod(Briyani-5, instead-6)

  (PP (IN At)
    (NP (NNP $))))


root(ROOT-0, At-1)
pobj(At-1, $-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 5.80))
      (PP (IN per)
        (NP (NN plate))))
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB definitely))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the)
              (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ expensive))
              (NNS Briyanies))
            (ADVP (RB around))))))
    (. .)))

            (, ,)))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Yi) (NNP Fen) (NNP Huo) ('' ''))
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP get)
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP what))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP pay)
                  (PP (IN for)))))))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
    (ADVP (RB Just))
    (VP (VBP look)
      (PP (IN at)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (NP (JJ beautiful) (DT the) (NN rice))
            (VP (VBZ is))))))
    (. !)))

nsubj(look-14, Huo-3)
nsubj(get-7, you-6)
dep(Huo-3, get-7)
pobj(for-11, what-8)

ccomp(get-7, pay-10)
prep(pay-10, for-11)
advmod(look-14, Just-13)
root(ROOT-0, look-14)
prep(look-14, at-15)
advmod(is-20, how-16)
amod(rice-19, beautiful-17)
det(rice-19, the-18)

pcomp(at-15, is-20)

          (NP (PRP it)))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP
        (ADJP (RB not) (JJ oily))
        (CC and)
        (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ similar)))
      (PP (TO to)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP know)
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ local) (NNP Briyani))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN On)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN right))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN picture)))))
    (NP (JJ above))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ Turkish) (NNP Dum) (NNP Briyani))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (ADJP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN tad))
                  (JJ oily)))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VBZ has)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNS raisins)
                    (CC and)
                    (NNS nuts))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (PRP it))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(oily-17, is-14)

  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD found)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ Iranian) (NNP Briyani))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN left))
          (ADJP (RB too) (JJ much))))

        (NP (JJ normal) (JJ boiled) (NN rice))))
    (. .)))
